mean_en: a feeling that you get when something affects your body; a general feeling or impression that is difficult to explain; an experience or a memory
sentence: This live TV show has caused an unexpected sensation on social media.
sentence_trans: 这个电视直播节目在社交媒体上引起了意想不到的轰动。
word_etyma: sens感觉 + ation 表示行为、状态、结果 → sensation（感官的）感觉能力
